issue.description: Can unplaced contig NW_001878222.3 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: End sequence alignments place contig NW_001878222.3 comprising the finished components CR762480.10 and CR847571.10 on chromosome 21, in the gap between BX537120.8 and CU856518.9 (ZG-4229) they have been placed in this gap.
